title: essembie's friday night community matches 930pm sydney time.
body:
Used to do some of these on old GD. 

Looking to see if I can get some off the  ground again.

Vote for what you want to play!

Flesh (clothesless characters / skins which show skin) vs 
metal (includes marauder skins etc)

Rest is self explanatory. 

Vote if you want a hit.

replies.body:
Freljord reigns supreme.

Was a good game - early pressure from teemo who was facing a tryn but ultimately the aniv just got too strong.

WP all - thanks for game!

> Was a good game - early pressure from teemo who was facing a tryn but ultimately the aniv just got too strong.

Please. We all know it was me who won that game.
Oh yeah, this is happening tonight. Completely slipped my mind.
Game name "Freljord Vs Yordles 930pm" - will be in lobby from about 9.15
Game name "Freljord Vs Yordles 930pm" - will be in lobby from about 9.15
Will post name of game in GD chat channel at ~ 9.10ish

Looks like freehold vs yordles! 

I'll update this post with the game name this eve so you can join
Who is going to cast tge deciding vote?
Neck and neck with the first few categories.

Further explanation of first theme.

Flesh = zac, fizz, urgot, officer cait, huntress siv, janna, ryze, ruthless mantheon, gragas, nami, zyra, 
metal = blitz, leo, any battlecast, full metal jayce / rammus / panth, any of the marauder / warden skins, mecha kha / aatrox / malph, full machine viktor, project yas etc etc.

Feel free to add others who fit the bill.

Remember folks this is all in the name of fun :)
Steel Legion (Lux and Garen) would be metal, right?
lol the voting system want the yordles to face Ice giants.
